item.title: 以色列维持利率不变，让通胀有时间回到目标水平
item.description: 以色列中央银行连续第 12 次维持利率不变，为近期谢克尔的反弹提供了更多时间来减缓通胀，并为降低借贷成本铺平道路。【原文：Israel’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for the 12th consecutive time, giving a recent rally in the shekel more time to slow inflation and pave the way for lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: CoreWeave 将以约 90 亿美元收购 Core Scientific
item.description: CoreWeave 公司表示，该公司已同意以价值约 90 亿美元的全股票交易收购 Core Scientific 公司，这将使该公司能够扩大其人工智能数据中心的容量。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. said it has agreed to buy Core Scientific Inc. in an all-stock deal worth about $9 billion that will allow it to expand its artificial intelligence data center capacity.】

item.title: 英国争取美国在关键期限前削减钢铁关税
item.description: 在本周三的最后期限到来之前，英国正努力争取美国同意将取消对英国钢铁征收关税的协议付诸实施。【原文：The UK is racing to secure US agreement to make operational a deal to eliminate tariffs on British steel ahead of a Wednesday deadline when American officials could choose instead to raise the levy to 50%.】

item.title: 工会称意大利斯泰兰迪斯上半年汽车产量下滑
item.description: 一家汽车工人工会警告说，Stellantis NV 的意大利汽车产量在上半年下降了三分之一，今年有望从 2024 年创下的数十年新低进一步下滑。【原文：Stellantis NV’s Italian car production cratered by a third in the first half and is poised to sink further this year from a multi-decade low set in 2024, an autoworkers’ union warned.】

item.title: 泽西海岸学区因增税避免破产
item.description: 新泽西州通过提高财产税的预算案后，新泽西州的一个学区将有可能避免申请破产。【原文：A New Jersey school district will likely avoid filing for bankruptcy after the state passed a budget that raised property taxes.】

item.title: 特里-史密斯在丹麦生命科学大会上抨击诺和诺德、Coloplast
item.description: 特里-史密斯（Terry Smith）抨击了丹麦最大的两家生命科学公司--诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和Coloplast公司（Coloplast A/S），因为这两家公司影响了这位经常被称为 "英国巴菲特 "的人所管理的股票基金。【原文：Terry Smith slammed two of Denmark’s largest life sciences companies — Novo Nordisk A/S and Coloplast A/S — after they weighed on the equity fund run by the man often dubbed ‘Britain’s Warren Buffett.’】

item.title: 战略公司第二季度未实现收益达 140 亿美元
item.description: 由于比特币价格反弹以及最近的会计变更，迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司在第二季度获得了 140.5 亿美元的未实现收益。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy registered an unrealized gain of $14.05 billion in the second quarter due to a rebound in Bitcoin’s price and a recent accounting change.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收额外关税后，金砖国家处于观望状态
item.description: 周一早上，金砖五国官员集体低头不语，因为他们一夜之间被美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的威胁惊醒，他威胁要惩罚采取了他所说的 "反美 "政策的金砖五国。【原文：BRICS officials kept their collective heads down on Monday morning as they awoke to an overnight threat by US President Donald Trump to penalize them for adopting policies he said were “anti-American.”】

item.title: 据说 Blackstone 已就 Allegiant 度假村 200 美元的交易达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已同意以约 2 亿美元的价格收购 Allegiant Travel Co.【原文：Blackstone Inc. has agreed to purchase Allegiant Travel Co.’s Sunseeker Resort for about $200 million, far less than the $720 million that the parent of Allegiant Airlines spent building the beleaguered retreat, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易战阻碍经济增长，加拿大人的就业保障更加薄弱
item.description: 由于经济难以找到动力，加拿大人对自己的就业前景越来越不乐观。【原文：Canadians are becoming less optimistic about their job prospects as the economy struggles to find momentum.】

item.description:

item.title: 印度法院驳回切莱比关于失去安全许可的申诉
item.description: 土耳其地勤公司 Celebi Hava Servisi AS 曾在今年早些时候南亚邻国之间的武装冲突中支持巴基斯坦，印度法院驳回了该公司就撤销其在印度的安全许可提出的请求。【原文：An Indian court rejected Turkish ground handling firm Celebi Hava Servisi AS’s plea against the revoking of its security clearance in India following Turkey’s support of Pakistan during an armed conflict between the South Asian neighbors earlier this year.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 延期批准新药，KalVista 股价大涨
item.description: KalVista Pharmaceuticals Inc.周一早盘股价上涨了19%，此前该公司称其治疗遗传性血管性水肿的药片获得了美国食品药品管理局的批准。【原文：KalVista Pharmaceuticals Inc. shares rose 19% early Monday after the company said it received US Food and Drug Administration approval for its pill for hereditary angioedema, a rare and potentially deadly condition that causes severe swelling throughout the body.】

item.title: 沙特储蓄银行支持债务交易公司进军私人信贷领域
item.description: Stc 集团的风险投资部门投资了沙特债务交易平台 Tarmeez Capital，该平台计划进军私人信贷领域。【原文：Stc Group’s venture capital arm has invested in Tarmeez Capital, a Saudi debt trading platform planning a push into private credit.】

item.title: 亚马逊购物机器人与 Prime 性能不相称
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔将关注亚马逊购物机器人 Rufus 的表现。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the performance of Amazon’s shopping bot, Rufus.】

item.title: 孟加拉国期待与美国就贸易协议达成 "积极成果
item.description: 孟加拉国临时政府期待与美国的贸易谈判能达成有利的解决方案，因为孟加拉国是受唐纳德-特朗普总统 4 月份全面关税打击最严重的国家之一。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim government is anticipating a favorable resolution in trade negotiations with the US, after being among the hardest hit by President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs in April.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议对特朗普的 "快速通道 "而言过于复杂
item.description: 曾经的解放日，这将是唐纳德-特朗普总统重新谈判美国与世界贸易关系的一周。【原文：Once upon a Liberation Day, this was going to be the week by which President Donald Trump would have renegotiated America’s trading relationships with the world.】

item.title: 调查显示：智利投资者重新找回风险偏好
item.description: 随着全球市场动荡的一年终于开始平静下来，智利的固定收益投资者重新找回了风险偏好。【原文：As a turbulent year on global markets finally begins to calm, Chile fixed-income investors are rediscovering their appetite for risk.】

item.title: 在周三最后期限到来之前，特朗普设定 8 月 1 日开始征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在周一宣布贸易协议并发出关税警告，各国通过周末谈判，以避免在周三截止日期前对其出口美国的产品采取最高惩罚性措施。【原文：President Donald Trump plans to announce trade deals and deliver tariff warnings on Monday, as countries negotiated through the weekend to avoid the highest punitive measures on their exports to the US before a Wednesday deadline.】

item.title: 华为人工智能实验室驳斥抄袭竞争对手机型的指责
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.）秘密的人工智能研究实验室反击了有关其依赖竞争对手的模型开发自己的盘古平台的指责，采取了不同寻常的步骤，反驳了有关其人工智能工作的说法。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s secretive AI research lab has pushed back against accusations it relied on rivals’ models to develop its own Pangu platform, taking the unusual step of rebutting claims about its artificial intelligence efforts.】

item.title: 美国关税倒计时，印度采取谨慎态度
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府正面临国内压力，要求保护印度政治敏感的农业部门，因为印度正努力与特朗普政府达成贸易协议，躲避美国提高关税。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government is facing domestic pressure to protect India’s politically-sensitive farm sector as the nation scrambles to close a trade deal with the Trump administration and dodge higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 摩根大通称南非股市将继续反弹
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：South African stocks are poised to extend their rally in the second half, buoyed by an improving outlook for the domestic economy and supportive monetary policy, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 美国收紧贸易政策，短期国债表现出色
item.description: 本周是全球贸易的关键一周，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加大了对其他国家的压力，要求它们在本周三的最后期限到来之前达成贸易协议。【原文：Short-dated Treasuries outperformed at the start of a key week for global trade, with US President Donald Trump intensifying pressure on other countries to strike trade deals ahead of a Wednesday deadline.】

item.title: 模型失灵让华尔街货币交易员成了瞎子
item.description: 华尔街一些屡试不爽的货币策略不再奏效，就连最老练的交易员也对此感到困惑。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s tried-and-true currency strategies aren’t working anymore, and it’s baffling even the most seasoned traders.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德退伍军人成立公司，押注医疗保健和保险业
item.description: 在布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）工作了约二十年后，Bahir Manios 和 David Levenson 创办了自己的公司，投资于基础设施、医疗保健和金融服务领域。【原文：After about two decades of working for Brookfield Asset Management, Bahir Manios and David Levenson have launched their own firm to invest in infrastructure, health care and financial services.】

item.title: 私人信贷配售代理公司 Briarcliffe 收购欧洲公司
item.description: 总部位于纽约的私人信贷配售代理公司 Briarcliffe Credit Partners 收购了总部位于伦敦的 Branch Advisory，以帮助在欧洲争取机构客户。【原文：Briarcliffe Credit Partners, a private credit placement agent headquartered in New York, has acquired London-based Branch Advisory to help court institutional clients in Europe.】

item.title: 特朗普已让下任美联储主席的工作变得更难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普承认，他向美联储施加的降息压力，事实上正在加大央行降息的难度。【原文：President Donald Trump has acknowledged the intense pressure he’s laying on the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates is, in fact, making it harder for the central bank to do just that.】

item.title: 中国考虑将 "南向债券通 "规模扩大一倍至 1,390 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑将本地投资者用于购买海外债券的投资渠道扩大一倍，这是中国努力放松资金流动限制的重要一步。【原文：China is considering doubling an investment channel local investors use to buy bonds overseas, according to people familiar with the matter, a major step in its efforts to loosen restrictions on financial flows.】
